plugins.name: mongodb-agent-skills
plugins.description: MongoDB best practices with 129 rules across 4 skills: Schema Design (30 rules), Query & Index Optimization (46 rules), Vector Search/AI (33 rules), and Transactions/Consistency (20 rules). Covers anti-patterns, data modeling, indexing, aggregation, vector search, RAG, transaction retries, and ACID consistency patterns.
